org.geysermc.connector.network.translators.world

Class WorldManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.geysermc.connector.network.translators.world.WorldManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeyserWorldManager

    public abstract class WorldManager
extends Object
    Class that manages or retrieves various information from the world. Everything in this class should be safe to return null or an empty value in the event that chunk caching or anything of the sort is disabled on the standalone version of Geyser.

        y - the chunk's Y coordinate
        z - the chunk's Z coordinate
        section - the chunk section to store the block data in

      • hasMoreBlockDataThanChunkCache

        public abstract boolean hasMoreBlockDataThanChunkCache()
        Checks whether or not this world manager has access to more block data than the chunk cache.

        Some world managers (e.g. Spigot) can provide access to block data outside of the chunk cache, and even with chunk caching disabled. This method provides a means to check if this manager has this capability.

        Returns:
        whether or not this world manager has access to more block data than the chunk cache

      • getBiomeDataAt

        public abstract int[] getBiomeDataAt(GeyserSession session,
                                     int x,
                                     int z)
        Gets the Java biome data for the specified chunk.
        Parameters:
        session - the session of the player
        x - the chunk's X coordinate
        z - the chunk's Z coordinate
        Returns:
        the biome data for the specified region with a length of 1024.
